# HUD::FLASH_MINIMAP_DISPLAY

## Summary
For 1397187 + 1402724

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
flashes the minimap display white

adds a short flash to the Radar/Minimap
Usage: UI.FLASH_MINIMAP_DISPLAY
